title: Polki Diamond Lavangam Haaram - Timeless Elegance
materials: High-Quality Zircon Accents. Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This delicate haaram features three gracefully suspended Lavangam (clove-shaped) pendants. Each pendant showcases a brilliant, uncut Polki diamond at its heart, surrounded by a halo of shimmering zircons. The setting is meticulously crafted to highlight the unique character of each Polki, evoking a sense of old-world charm and opulence.
colors: with the icy brilliance of Polki diamonds and the sparkle of white zircons. A timeless color palette that complements a variety of skin tones and outfits.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional occasions like weddings
as well as modern events where you want to add a touch of regal elegance. A versatile piece that transitions seamlessly from day to night.
description: This Polki diamond haaram is a testament to enduring craftsmanship and cultural heritage. Polki diamonds are prized for their natural beauty and are considered auspicious in South Indian traditions. The piece is not just jewelry; it's an heirloom to be treasured for generations. It will retain its beauty for a long time. Add this treasure to your collection.
